abstract: The retired chief executive of Citigroup fell off the Forbes list of the 400 richest Americans, along with 31 other tycoons of yesteryear.
snippet: The retired chief executive of Citigroup fell off the Forbes list of the 400 richest Americans, along with 31 other tycoons of yesteryear.
lead_paragraph: The travails of Citigroup are readily apparent in the fortunes of Sanford I. Weill, the bank’s retired chief executive, who created its House of Sandy financial supermarket.

headline.main: Sandy Weill Gets That Sinking Feeling
